text: Fombawi, also known as Fombaoui, is a town in the Ouenou arrodissement in the Borgou Department of Benin. It is an administrative division under the jurisdiction of the commune of Nikki. According to the population census in 2013, the village had a total population of 2,348. Category:Borgou Department Category:Populated places in Benin
title: Fombawi
